name: Fly ! Sugar: flying squirrel
description:
Help the flying squirrel to escape from the barriers and get further down.

Control the flying squirrel with TAP.

- Control the timing with Tap. It is more difficult than expected.

- Change to Super Sugar by collecting Combo not colliding with the barriers.

- The further you go down, the more diamonds you get.

- Collect more than 20 types of flying squirrels. (It is expected to be updated additionally.)

- You are the physical emperor, if you go down 100m.

[Notice!] If you delete the game, the data are deleted.
